pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
pre_caption: This is a scenic aerial shot of a majestic, snow-covered mountain landscape. The camera performs a slow, sweeping pan to the left. The view features a prominent peak covered in snow-laden evergreen trees, with a sea of white clouds filling the valleys below. In the distance, a more rugged, snow-capped mountain range is visible on the horizon under a clear, light-blue sky.
